name: emi.arc-core
description:
The Hosting Environment Daemon (HED) is the container of all the functional components of the next

generation of the Advanced Resource Connector (ARC) middleware on the server side. It is the central part

in a new very lightweight incarnation of ARC that is aimed at - but not limited to - providing Web Service.
releaseNotes:
What's new:



    * Feature:

          o 2477 - Distribute ARC nagios plugins together with the next ARC release 

    * High priority bugs fixed:

          o 2534 - Absent clients metapackage in 1.0.1rc1

          o 2479 - MinGW packages fails nightly build

          o 2015 - merged standalone to contain both new and old client tools

          o 2592 - cache lockfile leak

          o 2609 - download fails if one of the srm replicas cannot be fetched

          o 2509 - Information system manual/guide is needed 

    * Medium priority bugs fixed:

          o 1832 - placeholders remain in the profiles and the inis on debian 



Deployment notes:



    * This release does not introduce any changes in the deployment procedures described in ARC documentation
